page.title: 07 THE VILLAGE HALL
page.content:
The hall at Roadwater was built forthe village by the Reckitt family who live close by in Gosnocott. It is next to the recreation ground and is built on the side of a hill. At the back is the car park. The hall has a projection room, a kitchen, a committee room and a stage in the main hall with some stage lighting. It can be used by anyone for any party or celebration. During the week it is used by:-{ {The Badminton Club} Tuesday { {The Playgroup} Friday morning {The Mother and Toddler Group {The Snooker Club} evenings {The Roadwater Players }in seasons {The Youth Club } Tuesday evening
Sometimes there are junior discos in the evenings. The hall looked after by Mr Bond who works at the garage next door.
